name: Teylos City
description:
Disclaimer: This game is a Demo.

Take on the role of a vigilante superhero in a city stuck in the 80’s. Sunset Savior is not the hero that Teylos City needs, but the one Teylos City deserves. Joined by feline American super hacker Tuffy, Sunset Savior fights the evils that have infested her beloved city with a sword in one hand, and a gun in the other.

On this particular evening their target is the mega corporation Damon Industries. After hacking into the company’s servers on a dare, Tuffy learned that Damon Industries kidnapped renowned robotics specialist Sayuri Silvermann. It’s now up to Sunset Savior and her cat companion to rescue her from Damon’s grip! Navigate neon lit streets and shadowy alleys, break into Damon’s heavily guarded robotics lab, rescue Sayuri, and smash every last android that stands in your way

A downloadable game for Windows

Features:
Authentic rollerblade movement controls 
Multiple ammo types (2)
Multiple enemy types (2… again)
Tubular music that gets totally stuck in your head
A lot of optional dialogue (written by a guy held at gunpoint)
Mouse and Keyboard controls

Credits:
3D Graphics: Sara Hagberg &  Emil Ivarsson
Animation: Emelina Johansson &  Sara Jonasson
Game Design:  Corinne Ahlsén
Game Writing: Hannes FrankMusic production: Jon- Petter Barkman
Programming: Ellinor Bergfeldt & Liam Säll Linnarsson
Sound design: Johan Clifford

Third party assets:
Audio tool: FMOD Studio https://www.fmod.com/

Dialog system: Fungus https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/game-toolkits/fungus-3418 

  Warning: Strong lights!
